thread.section_title: Smooth Hotel Rome Termini - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel and clean
thread.title_full: Best hotel and clean - Review of Smooth Hotel Rome Termini, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Ana C
title: Best hotel and clean
text: Seriously could not have asked for anything better. It's such a huge relief to stay at a place where everyone is so welcoming and kind. We stayed for one week and didn't have a problem. Great location and close to everything! We walked to many of the famous cite seeing locations and ask close to the tour buses bus stop! Safe area too!
